{{ underline }}

.. currentmodule:: {{ module }}
.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}

{% block attributes %}
{% if attributes %}
   .. rubric:: Attributes
   .. autosummary::
      :toctree:
   {% for item in all_attributes %}
      {%- if not item.startswith('_') %}
      {{ name }}.{{ item }}
      {%- endif -%}
   {%- endfor %}
{% endif %}
{% endblock %}

{% block methods %}
{% if methods %}
   .. rubric:: Methods
   .. autosummary::
      :toctree:
   {% for item in all_methods %}
      {%- if not item.startswith('_') or item in ['__call__'] %}
      {{ name }}.{{ item }}
      {%- endif -%}
   {%- endfor %}
{% endif %}
{% endblock %}
